item.title: Railway acts after Tatkal ticket scam expose
item.description: An expose by IBN7 had showed how touts cornered bulk of the tickets meant for emergency travel and then sold them at a premium.

item.title: NIA files FIR against Abu Jundal, Fayaz Kagzi
item.description: Jundal and Kagzi are senior operatives of terror group LeT, which carried out the Mumbai carnage.

item.title: BSY takes on BJP again, seeks CM post for Shettar
item.description: The BJP Core Group will meet at party chief Nitin Gadkari's residence to discuss the crisis in the Karnataka unit of the party.
